subject: 2 in 1 shifter
description_text:
Dear team,

I reside in malta eu and would like to buy your new pre sale 2 in 1 (h
shifter, sequential shifter). Do you ship from EU country or outside Europe?

Br

Steve C

conversations.body_text: Hi Steve Cutajar,  We will soon complete production and ship to our warehouse in Germany, so shipments from Germany to the EU will be tax-free.   Currently, your order may be shipped directly from China.
